alert.note: Alert for Custer (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 10:02PM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR WESTERN CUSTER...CENTRAL FALL RIVER AND SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1001 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Bear Mountain Lookout to 3 miles south of Argyle to near Ardmore, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs, Custer, Hill City, Edgemont, Pringle, Provo, Mystic, Moon, Deerfield, Argyle, Rumford, Ardmore, Deerfield Reservoir, Wind Cave National Park, Stockade Lake, Maverick Junction, Legion Lake, Crazy Horse Memorial, Angostura Reservoir and Blue Bell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
